text: 19:7 Godɨn Araziba 10:17; Aposel 10:34; Rom 9:14; 1 Pita 1:17Ikiavɨra Itir God, en God, kotiamɨn aven, guizɨn arazim giragh kotiaba baraghamin araziba, ko uan namakabar akabar akurvaghamin araziba ko, gumazamiziba ia apezeper dagɨaba ia danɨngamin araziba, arazir kaba God bar dar aghua. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia gumazir kotiaba tuisɨziba, ia Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn atiatingɨva bar an apengan ikɨ, egh deraghvɨra uan arazibar gan.”
